hooks.command: python3 -c "import sys, json; cmd=json.loads(sys.stdin.read()).get('input',{}).get('cli_command',''); blocked=['delete','terminate','stop','remove','deregister','put-','create-','modify','update','run-instances','start-instances','reboot']; matches=[b for b in blocked if b in cmd.lower()]; sys.exit(1) if matches else sys.exit(0)"
hooks.description: Block write operations during cost scanning (read-only safety)
